name: To Whom I Loved
description:
To Whom I Loved is an 18+ fantasy furry visual novel where you travel as our protagonist (Default name: Asted) to deliver a mysterious letter, only to find yourself stumbling upon a series of unforeseeable events. 

(Please note that the game is still in early development and might be subject to change.)

Credits

Written by: SimonRatfilled 

Programming by: SimonRatfilled  with the help of MarcyDragonWolf

Script edited by: MashPotitties

Featuring music by:  GreysonVulf

Backgrounds & Cgs by: KUROOObunbun

Sprites & Logo by:  TheblindOri

Socials

Feel free to join our Discord server!

Please consider supporting my Ko-fi, your funds will directly go to the production of our future chapters as I might not have the necessary funds to develop this project alone.
